articles.description: Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) chairman Ehsan Mani, on Sunday, said that the Asia Cup is likely to be played in 2023 if India qualify for the World Test Championship final in June.
articles.title: Asia Cup to be postponed to 2023 if India play World Test Championship final in June: PCB chairman Ehsan Mani - India Today
